message:
Thank you for checking in! Please wait in your car. You'll receive a text as soon as we can see you.

You must complete your Health Screening before entering the building. This is required and being tracked.

https://healthscreening.walmart.com

Text CANCEL to cancel the checkin. Text STOP to unsubscribe. Text Help for more information.
Unsubscribing before you've been helped, will cancel your checkin.
subject: first contact

message: By submitting the form below, you agree to receive a text alert once we can safely allow you into the building. Msg&Data Rates May Apply.
subject: check in page

message: We are ready to see you.
subject: ready notification

id: Invalid response! Valid responses are: HERE to checkin, CANCEL to cancel checkin, STOP to unsubscribe, & HELP for more info
subject: invalid response

message: You're already checked in. Please wait and we'll notify you as soon as you can come into the building.
subject: already_checked_in_response

message: You have no open check-in. Please text HERE if you are needing to check-in.
subject: invalid_cancellation_request
